Reviews.Title: “Very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: NileCruiser
Reviews.Content: weve stayed la quinta twice past total 9 days visiting friends family weve experienced definitely stay staff definite asset visit failed check closet left pieces clothing helpful staff rescued clothes mailed day

Reviews.Title: “Cockaroaches!”
Reviews.Author: Adriana M
Reviews.Content: happy stay smell clean strong smell urine carpet phone worst total 3 short stay grossed checked immediately recommend alland yes noise pretty bad

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: RDShell
Reviews.Content: stayed la quinta nights impressed property overall parking lot bit crowded found spot nicely furnished comfortable beds complimentary breakfast quick meal waffles available bit elevator waits note rollaway bed comfortable 10 night charge definitely worth bad rollaway makes bad following day rollaway comfortable normal bed sometimes little appreciate

Reviews.Title: “really nice”
Reviews.Author: holly h
Reviews.Content: surprised nice heard unflattering chain absolutely stay clean carpet little worn condition breakfast buffet nice lots choose yogurt coffee muffin front desk staff pleasant friendly issue elevator broke carry bag 5 flights otherwise nice hotel recommend traveler budget coffee maker fridge bathroom desk roomy nice lots pillows faced highway little loud 5 minutes didnt notice anymore

Reviews.Title: “Satisfied stay for 24 hours”
Reviews.Author: mbtran321
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel tricky missed entrance hotelif uturn bad clean overslept missed buffet am ethernet cables forgot bring prices accommodations super plays etc business center useful clean comfy beds clean bathroom overall arrived 3pm sat checked sunday 1030am

HotelInfo.Name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Dallas North Central
HotelInfo.Address: 10001 North Central Expressway, Highway 75, Dallas, TX 75231-4103
